snippet: The museums will share a gift from the estate of Mary Griggs Burke, whose collection of Japanese and other East Asian art ranked among the finest in the world.
abstract: The museums will share a gift from the estate of Mary Griggs Burke, whose collection of Japanese and other East Asian art ranked among the finest in the world.

headline.main: Metropolitan Museum and Minneapolis Institute to Share Large Collection of Asian Art
headline.print_headline: A Minneapolis Museum and the Met to Share Gift
